short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SaveFree is a free Instagram Downloader. Support Instagram users to save favorite photos and videos directly on the web browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SaveFree is an essential browser extension designed to help users quickly save and download their favorite photos or videos from Instagram. With its user-friendly interface and powerful features, SaveFree makes it easy to keep your cherished Instagram moments on your device.

üí° Main Features of SaveFree:

‚úÖ Video Downloader: Effortlessly download videos from Instagram in the highest quality available, up to 4k resolution.
‚úÖ Photo Downloader: Save full-sized photos from Instagram posts with just a click.
‚úÖ Story Downloader: Download Instagram Stories and Highlights instantly.
‚úÖ IG Reels Downloader: Download Reels and IGTV videos for free.
‚úÖ Profile Downloader: Download Instagram profiles and profile pictures in high definition.

üîç How to Use SaveFree on Chrome Browser:

1Ô∏è‚É£  Open Instagram: Launch the Chrome browser and go to Instagram.com.
2Ô∏è‚É£  Find Your Content: Navigate to the photo or video you wish to download.
3Ô∏è‚É£  Download: Click the "Download" icon located at the bottom of the video.
4Ô∏è‚É£  Save to Device: A new tab will open, displaying the photo or video you want to download. You can then save it directly to your device.

üìù Note:

After installing the extension, be sure to reload the Instagram tab where you want to download the video so that SaveFree can recognize the video file!
